name: Earth Elemental
damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons

special_abilities.name: Earth Glide.
descriptions: The elemental can burrow through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone. While doing so, the elemental doesn't disturb the material it moves through.

special_abilities.name: Siege Monster.
descriptions: The elemental deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.name: Multiattack.
descriptions: The elemental makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage.
